definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: The old walrus turned her head slowly and opened her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 那隻老海象慢慢地轉過頭來，睜開了眼睛。

sentences.english: Walruses have enormous appetites and hunt for food almost constantly.
sentences.chinese: 海象食慾極大，幾乎一直在獵取食物。

sentences.english: The shape of Walrus evolved out of the Manatee species.
sentences.chinese: 海象的外形是從海牛物種裏演化而成。

sentences.english: Thats true for hyacinths and homo sapiens, walruses and raz, which is a fish. A switch hitting fiSh.
sentences.chinese: 對於風信子，智人，海象和隆頭魚來說都是如此。

sentences.english: The male elephant seal fight over females for the rights to mate.
sentences.chinese: 公海象們爲了爭奪母海象的芳心及交配權而鬥。

sentences.english: Several thousand walruses are on the beach, packed shoulder to shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 數千海象伏在海岸上，摩肩擦踵。

sentences.english: Unlike seals, walruses cannot swim indefinitely.
sentences.chinese: 不同於海豹，海象不能一直游泳。

sentences.english: Walruses eat huge numbers of bivalves , maybe 7,000 a day.
sentences.chinese: 海象喫大量雙殼貝，一天可能喫7，000個。

sentences.english: The animals often search for food over the continental shelf of the Chukchi Sea.
sentences.chinese: 這些海象們通常在楚克奇海洋的大陸架上覓食。

sentences.english: Walrus need either ice or land to rest.
sentences.chinese: 海象的主要休息地爲冰面或陸地。

sentences.english: If the boss is a creep, why not run wild on the chocolate-covered walrus blubber?
sentences.chinese: 如果老闆是個混蛋，不如狂喫包巧克力的海象肉吧？

sentences.english: In Russia, “walrus” clubs perform this function.
sentences.chinese: 在俄羅斯，“海象”俱樂部就是由冬泳愛好者組成的。

sentences.english: Walruses are vulnerable to stampedes when they gather in such large numbers.
sentences.chinese: 當他們那麼大批的聚在一起時，海象很容易受驚嚇跑。

sentences.english: Female walruses also take to the ice to give birth, and to care for their young.
sentences.chinese: 雌性的海象通常還會在冰塊上產子和照顧幼仔。

sentences.english: But at the same time two harpoon -like ivory tusks shot throughtheair.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，海象的兩顆像魚叉般的長牙刺向空中。

sentences.english: He looked defiantly at the bellowing walrus .
sentences.chinese: 但它還在挑戰似地望着怒吼的海象。

definition: white whale/beluga/Moby Dick, novel by Herman Melville 赫曼·麥爾維爾|赫曼·麦尔维尔[He4 man4 · Mai4 er3 wei2 er3]
